name: usaepayfront
description: This project was bootstrapped with [Create React App](https://github.com/facebook/create-react-app).

scripts.dev:server: cd client && npm build && cd .. && npm start
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm install terser@3.14.1 --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
